content.en: Algorithmic blood pressure: Scientists have been studying how algorithms are used in various devices to measure blood pressure. These algorithms play a crucial role in determining the accuracy and applicability of these devices. For example, algorithms are used in automated blood pressure monitors, wearable devices, and even smartwatches to estimate blood pressure without the need for invasive procedures.
content.da: Algoritmisk blodtryk: Forskere har studeret, hvordan algoritmer bruges i forskellige enheder til at måle blodtryk. Disse algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i at bestemme nøjagtigheden og anvendeligheden af disse enheder. For eksempel bruges algoritmer i automatiske blodtryksmålere, bærbare enheder og endda smartwatches til at estimere blodtryk uden behov for invasive procedurer.
